m_szDocTitle: 전동차 회생 에너지활용에 따른 에너지 및 CO₂ 절감 분석에 관한 연구 - 조명·전기설비학회논문지 - 한국조명·전기설비학회 : 전자저널 논문 - DBpia
m_szDocSumamry: 조명·전기설비학회논문지 제24권 제9호,  2010.9, 85-96 (12 pages) 전동차 회생 에너지활용에 따른 에너지 및 CO₂ 절감 분석에 관한 연구 A Study on Reduction of Energy and CO₂ Emission by Using Regenerative Energy of Electric Vehicle APA 스타일 영어 초록 The recent environmental protection trend requires more strict energy saving, therefore every transportation system should reduce energy consumption to the minimum value. High-efficiency operation system, energy saving and CO₂ emissions shall be addressed as important issues in railway system. These issues are the most essential factors of railway, compared to major public transportation system. R
